title: MoneyCard For Riot Points?
body: I was wandering if i could use money card to buy some riot points

replies.body: When you say money card, what do you mean exactly?  Check out our [RP guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/115001242827-Buying-RP) here as well for quite a bit of options on purchasing RP!

Hey, sorry for the delay in responding here.  It should still work but if you run into any issue hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can work with you to find some options best fit for you!
